message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.lowlevel.pelionclouddevicemanagement.CollectionFormats.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - retrofit2.http.*.
Abbreviation in name 'deleteCertificateIssuerConfigByID' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'getCertificateIssuerConfigByID' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'updateCertificateIssuerConfigByID' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
